SEARCH
Module MyFractal
Package fractal

Class Edge

java.lang.Object
fractal.Edge
public class Edge extends Object
The Edge class creates edges for the polygon and fractal to be used in the program. It gives valuable information used to draw the fractal.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Daniel Santillan
